document_data.name: Arkuel
document_data.mainbody: '''Arkuel''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
document_data.History: In [[1357]], Arkuel was one of the servants of the Cult's archmage, [[Malark Himbruel]], helping his master to enter the [[Twisted Tower of Ashaba]] in [[Shadowdale]] in order to capture [[Shandril Shessair]].
